sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī zhìdìng le xīn de jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a élaboré un nouveau plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company has formulated a new plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan zhòng zhíwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime cultiver des plantes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like growing plants.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我通过中介租到了房子。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ tōngguò zhōngjiè zū dào le fángzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai loué un appartement par l'intermédiaire d'une agence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I rented a house through an agency.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 超市里有各种类的水果。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chāoshì lǐ yǒu gè zhǒnglèi de shuǐguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a toutes sortes de fruits au supermarché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are all kinds of fruits in the supermarket.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéhuì yùnyòng suǒ xué de zhīshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Apprenez à appliquer les connaissances acquises.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Learn to apply the knowledge you have learned.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng zhèngzài zhì tā de bìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin est en train de le soigner.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor is treating his illness.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī kuǎn zhìnéng shǒujī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un smartphone.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a smartphone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège chǎnpǐn de zhìliàng hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La qualité de ce produit est très bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The quality of this product is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè jiàoyù jīgòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un établissement d'enseignement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an educational institution.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi zhùmíng de zuòjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un écrivain célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a famous writer.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiānqì zhújiàn biàn nuǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps se réchauffe progressivement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather is gradually getting warmer.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要抓紧时间完成任务。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào zhuājǐn shíjiān wánchéng rènwu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons nous dépêcher de terminer la tâche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must hurry up to complete the task.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wèntí huì zhúbù jiějué de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le problème sera résolu progressivement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The problem will be solved step by step.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nóngmín zài tián lǐ zhòngzhí shuǐdào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les agriculteurs cultivent du riz dans les champs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Farmers grow rice in the fields.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zhèngzài zhuāngxiū fángzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous rénovons la maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are renovating the house.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhuǎnshēn líkāi le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'est retourné et est parti.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He turned around and left.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxí shí yào zhuānxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut se concentrer quand on étudie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should concentrate when studying.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì tā de zhùzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est son œuvre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is his work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ kāi zhāng fāpiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner une facture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me an invoice.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这篇文章描写了乡村生活。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè piān wénzhāng miáoxiě le xiāngcūn shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet article décrit la vie à la campagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This article describes rural life.
